captions.text: My name is Valentin Popov, I am from Yalta city.
In the first round I was riding with a very experienced rider from Kiev - Vitaliy Nechiporenko.
It was one of the most difficult rounds, and of course, the final round with Egor Primachek
The current champion of Ukraine so it was very intensive.

title: Downhill MTB Obstacle Challenge - Red Bull Big Duel 2012 Ukraine

comments.text:
Step 1: Take bike to trails/stairs. Step 2: Ride down trails/stairs. Step 
3: Crash. Step 4: Get back up. Try again. Step 5: Ride it out. Step 6: Find 
more complex trails/bigger stairs. Rinse and repeat. It isn't fucking 
rocket science. Doubt he is better than them though. Practice takes time 
and a lot of pain. Being a MTBer, I know from experience. :P
